forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of patchy fog early. Cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of patchy fog early. Cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High 62F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming less numerous overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent overnight. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 56F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
